View on GitHub
Topmarks Fonts free, open, and easy to use type for children's learning
The Topmarks fonts are being created in response to teachers and educators who find a lack of Free Software typefaces suitable for use in infant learning. The aim of developing the fonts is to widen the choice of suitable typefaces available to educationalists for use in their own applications to produce teaching resources such as worksheets and interactive whiteboard resources.

Free and open

The Topmarks fonts are released under the Open Font License. This license allows the fonts to be used freely, by unlimited numbers of users.

The Topmarks fonts can be used for printing, as webfonts, for setting digital documents, embedding in other software, used in commercial or non-commercial work, pretty much anything.

Also, being Free Software, the Topmarks fonts can be shared, given away, or even altered.

About the design

The Topmarks Fonts provide clear and easy letter shapes for reading that also direct children to ways in which handwriting is best formed.

The fonts are based on the free software font family 'Muli', a typeface that has already proven popular with children and teachers.

The forms of Muli are straightforward and easy to read, with the Topmarks design introducing features that are similar to popular precursive handwriting styles taught in schools.

It is intended that alternative letter formations will be available in some instances such as k, f, 1, 4 and 9, in the design as it is recognised that letter formation styles vary in early years educational establishments.

Download and try the fonts

To download and test the Topmarks fonts just use the links below. The fonts are supplied in both OpenType and TrueType formats. Please note that although the fonts do contain basic Latin character sets the current state of the fonts is still at a 'beta' stage. If you find any issues or wish to suggest changes, please email topmarks fonts

Topmarks-fonts.zip Topmarks-fonts.tar.gz

Donate to Topmarks Fonts

If you wish to donate to the development of the Topmarks Fonts you can do so with paypal or flattr. To donate simply click below on the button of your choice.
